name: scripts/config/config.js

scripts/containers/AppContainer.js
AppContainer
description:
### AppContainer
The top most container for the Typester app stack. This
container sets up the {@link FormatterContainer}, {@link UIContainer},
and {@link CanvasContainer} containers which in return setup various
modules that make up the app stack.

params.name: opts.dom.el
params.description: The dom element to be the canvas for Typester

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "typester",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "build/js/typester.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.js",
    "test_ci": "NODE_ENV=ci /node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.js",
    "test_e2e": "cd ./test/e2e && docker-compose run --rm nightwatch",
    "build": "rollup -c",
    "watch": "./node_modules/.bin/watch \"npm run build\" src/",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "devDependencies": {
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jasmine": "^2.6.0",
    "karma": "^1.7.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-coverage": "^1.1.1",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^1.0.1",
    "karma-jasmine": "^1.1.0",
    "karma-jasmine-jquery": "^0.1.1",
    "karma-junit-reporter": "^1.2.0",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "^1.0.4",
    "karma-rollup-preprocessor": "^4.0.0",
    "karma-sourcemap-loader": "^0.3.7",
    "karma-spec-reporter": "0.0.31",
    "rollup-plugin-buble": "^0.16.0",
    "rollup-plugin-istanbul": "^1.1.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "autoprefixer": "^6.7.7",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-es2015-rollup": "^3.0.0",
    "dompurify": "^1.0.2",
    "postcss": "^5.2.16",
    "rollup": "^0.50.0",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^3.0.2",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^8.0.2",
    "rollup-plugin-eslint": "^3.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-handlebars-plus": "^0.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^3.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-sass": "^0.4.10",
    "watch": "^1.0.2"
  }
}
name: package.json
